Activities commonly implemented under this intervention

Establish an emergency contingency fund.
Establish a livestock insurance scheme (to compensate for lost animals).
Establish plans to address disease outbreaks and pandemics.

P2. Traceability and compensation mechanism.
P3. Animal Welfare guidelines for culling animals for disease control
